post.body: I'm crawling into bed, about three hours sooner than I should be. At least it isn't six+ hours later than I should be. G'night.
I really feel bad for Michael, having to work outside in well below freezing, and sometimes even negative degree weather...
Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess... yeah... sounds like a good idea right about now.
maybe this will keep me from spamming the shite out of my Facebook profile w/status changes... hmmm...
is fucking heated! ...and I don't mean in a nice, toasty way either.
believes anyone who has ever owned a dog should read MARLEY & ME.
damn sneezing fits... ugh... at least I can blow my nose now.
Just finished A Wrinkle In Time, a book I haven't read in 10 years. I need to start reading more often again. I miss books...
been in one of "those" moods for several days now... can it be over NOW please?
I'm such a fucking emo kid.
why must the dogs be obnoxious? Still have a bit of a headache due to not being able to sleep off the Tylenol PM.
...and now a headache too?! come the fawk on!
Michael just got home, poor guy. For some reason now my stomach is feeling all gross. Back to sleep, hope to at least...
watching Wall-E before bed, it's been a few days since I've watched it. Waiting for Michael to get home.
